name: Nudel Tag
description:
In Nudel Tag, challenge your friends to get the most tips, in a crazy ramen restaurant !
Find up to 4 controllers, to have the most fun, and see who is the best waiter in the house !



You need to bring plates, from the chef, to the customers, easy, right ?
Well, unless the other waiters steal your plates and cash in your precious tips !



How can you get more chances to get some tips ?
Well, you can always spend what you got so far in bonuses



Have fun with this party game !
